Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/105th
ShortDescription: Northbound 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/105th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Halsted/105th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted and #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/107th-104th
ShortDescription: NB 8A South Halsted and 108 Halsted/95th  buses are  rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd and Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/107th-104th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #8A South Halsted and #108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 107th, Vincennes, 103rd, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to street blockage near Halsted/107th-104th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Goodman
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Lawrence, Milwaukee, Jefferson Park, Milwaukee & Central, due to street blockage near Central/Goodman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Lawrence, Milwaukee, Jefferson Park, Milwaukee, then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Central/Goodman.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are rerouted in both directions via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage nr 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temp. rerouted via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Minor Delays Due to Bridge Lift
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River, downtown.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge over the Chicago River, downtown.

Shuttle buses are available between Merchandise Mart and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.
 
Some trains may be held in stations or turned back towards Kimball before reaching the bridge to maintain service across the remainder of the route. Bus shuttle service is available at Merchandise Mart and Clark/Lake. Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding. Crews are working to correct the problem to allow us to safely resume service.
 
We apology for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Dept. of Bridge works to complete the bridge lift operation.  Allow extra travel time.
